title: FS: SL Jack Bastian SGC 3 OM, $275  SOLD

posts.post_title: FS: SL Jack Bastian SGC 3 OM, $275  SOLD
posts.post_content:
Great color (his cheeks are very rosy) and centering. Very light staining on back.  Old Mill backs are tougher to find in Texas League. Solid card overall.

Text me for scans: (862) 266-4952
$275 shipped, PayPal FF
[url]Bcommentucci@yahoo.com[/url]
Card has been sold. Thank you to those who reached out.
